name.description: The name of the Azure Maps Account. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: The name of the Resource Group in which the Azure Maps Account should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

sku_name.description: The sku of the Azure Maps Account. Possible values are `S0` and `S1`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the Azure Maps Account.

id.description: The ID of the Azure Maps Account.

primary_access_key.description: The primary key used to authenticate and authorize access to the Maps REST APIs.

secondary_access_key.description: The secondary key used to authenticate and authorize access to the Maps REST APIs.

x_ms_client_id.description: A unique identifier for the Maps Account.

create.description: Used when creating the Maps Account.

update.description: Used when updating the Maps Account.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Maps Account.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Maps Account.
